events.message: I have just filed a claim regarding the car accident that occurred yesterday involving my vehicle and another car at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident due to the collision and damage reported in the initial claim submission.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the claim process and provide updates on the investigation and repair process.
Your claim regarding the auto accident has been officially acknowledged, and the investigation into the damages and liability has begun.
Please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any medical bills related to injuries sustained in the car accident.
All requested documents including the police report and photos have been submitted through the customer portal for review.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has commenced to determine fault and assess the extent of damage sustained by the vehicle.
The investigation report is complete, confirming the collision was caused by the other driver and assessing repair estimates for the vehicle.
A settlement has been proposed based on the investigation findings, covering full repair costs and medical expenses related to the auto accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timeliness and fairness of the proposed settlement for the vehicle accident damages.
The claim approval has been finalized following customer confirmation, preparing for payment disbursal to cover all expenses.
Payment to cover vehicle repairs and associated medical bills has been issued to the policyholder's designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after full payment and customer acknowledgment of satisfaction with resolution.
The case files and all related documents of the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference if needed.
